title: Game Progress Route
content:
from information about Halsin to helping you defeat the Owlbear that injured Edowin. If you bring up the fact that you are a survivor of the Nautiloid crash, they will turn hostile and attack you.

You can freely choose any of the options without consequence to learn more about the topic you choose, except the second option where you say that you are not a True Soul.
